title: Vision. [No. 36]
creator_contributor_role: United States Information Agency, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Social life and customs
description: Cinemagazine: Ice boating which apparently began in China and came to the USA in 1790; the purification of the previously polluted Willamette River in Oregon; Caroline and Sandy Paton search for American folk songs and original instruments which they use in schools and community groups; the privately owned and operated Westar Satellite system linking New York and Los Angeles; The Big Brother of American Program which provides adult male companionship for 20,000 fatherless boys all over America.
